dcterms:description: An internal dataset of an American English female voice used for training neural TTS systems.
dcterms:title: Internal 36-hour dataset

dcterms:description: A 16-hour conversational expressive dataset from the same speaker to expand the prosodic coverage.
dcterms:title: 16-hour conversational expressive dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for training the Tacotron model, which is a sequence-to-sequence neural network for speech synthesis.
dcterms:title: Tacotron

dcterms:creator: S. Achanta
A. Antony
L. Golipour

T. Raitio

dcterms:description: A dataset used for training the WaveRNN model, which is an autoregressive neural network for generating speech from Mel-spectrograms.
dcterms:title: WaveRNN

dcterms:description: Mel-spectrograms are derived features from the speech data used in the training of TTS systems.
dcterms:title: Mel-spectrograms

dcterms:description: Audio samples generated from the controllable neural text-to-speech synthesis system using intuitive prosodic features.
dcterms:title: Audio samples from Controllable neural text-to-speech synthesis using intuitive prosodic features
